rules.cast: Blind everyone within 3 metres with bean juice

details.flavour: Industrial Grade

rules.cast: Summon a cast-steel anvil into existence above target character's head

details.flavour: Meep-Meep

rules.cast: Choose a visible article of clothing. A snake appears inside of it.

details.flavour: Always drink upstream from the herd

rules.cast: Throw a pair of bola around a visible target

details.flavour: Bolas are excellent for capturing large mammals, like my portly friend Steve

rules.cast: Put a large object or willing NPC in your hand

details.flavour: Brilliant for barging, barrowing, borrowing, bearing, busing, and bumming

rules.cast: Cast a handful of sand and pocket lint into the air before you

details.flavour: In total war, all tactics are acceptable

rules.cast: Choose a Blue or green in your hand. All cards in your hand become copies of that card.

details.flavour: Diversification is overrated

rules.cast: Target visible character will take 25 damage the next time they rest

details.flavour: Sweet dreams

rules.cast: Target willing character ceases to exist for up to 1 hour. They return to the last spot they existed in afterwards.

details.flavour: Existence is rather tiring, it's advisable to take a break every once in a while

rules.cast: Target NPC becomes tired

details.flavour: Man is born tired, and he lives to rest

rules.cast: A boundary, impenetrable from within, is placed 5 metres away from you in all directions as long as you'd like

details.flavour: After years of living in a cage, a lion no longer believes it is a lion

rules.cast: Target an entranceway. The next living creature to pass through it remains stuck until they take damage.

details.flavour: Well don't just stand there, come on in!

rules.cast: Cause target player to critically succeed on their next roll

details.flavour: The light will shine bright upon the chosen.

rules.cast: Stand atop an object. You and the object are flung in the direction of your choice until obstructed.

details.flavour: How clumsy of me.

rules.cast: Summon a rigged pair of dice which you can control with your mind.
rules.hand: Whenever you would roll a d20, flip a coin instead. Heads for a critical success, tails for a critical failure.

rules.cast: Teleport to a visible object you've touched
rules.hand: You know the location of every object you've ever touched

details.flavour: I don't know who stole my socks from the dryer, but I do know their days are numbered.

rules.cast: The ground shakes beneath you. All characters within 4 metres are knocked airborne.

details.flavour: Not suitable for tectonic fault zones.

rules.cast: Attacks deal double damage until you play your next card.

details.flavour: I'm not unarmed, I've got two of them.

rules.cast: Flip a coin. Heads: Deal 15 damage to visible target. Tails: Gun backfires, take 5 damage.

details.flavour: To get you out of a tight spot, like a colonial insurrection or a duel.

rules.cast: Choose a 4 square metre area to fill temporarily with an opaque smoke

details.flavour: Mildly anoxic.

rules.cast: Pick a point on the floor up to 2 metres away. The next NPC to walk there will fall over.

details.flavour: Nothing like a little prop humour.

rules.cast: Possess a non-magic object within 5 tiles of your body until you lose concentration.

details.flavour: There's something rather... lively, about this chair.

rules.cast: Evoke a disembodied hand to perform a simple action within 4 metres of you.

details.flavour: Give me five!

rules.cast: Choose two visible points. You will be alerted the next time an NPC walks between them.

details.flavour: Even if the bird flies high in the sky, the hunter places his trap on the ground.

rules.cast: Fire a cannonball at a target of your choice.
rules.hand: You're surrounded by a ghostly aura.

details.flavour: Cannonballs were designed to destroy ships and stone fortresses. The effect they have on the human body is unspeakable.

rules.cast: Apply a sandwich to the face of a visible character.

details.flavour: Indignity defeats the spirit, and the body is soon to follow.

rules.cast: Choose an NPC. They are stuck in place for ten seconds.

details.flavour: Have my legs always been this heavy?

rules.cast: Cover an object in a thin layer of ice.

details.flavour: Whoa, chill.

rules.cast: Burst into flames along with anyone you're touching.

details.flavour: I'm taking you straight to hell.

rules.cast: Touch an NPC to freeze both of you. Until your hand is removed, neither of you can attack or perform actions

details.flavour: Let's savour this moment forever.

rules.cast: Summon a pigeon to perform a simple task

details.flavour: He will try his best not to be distracted by breadcrumbs.

rules.cast: Your next melee attack sets your opponent on fire.
rules.hand: Your hands are invulnerable to damage.

details.flavour: I'm about to turn your Kitchen Dream into a Kitchen Nightmare
